title: Order event emote not working
body: I just bought with my order tokens the daybreak icon with event emote and i have the daybreak icon and the dawnbringer skin equipped but when i start the practice tool and press crtl 6 the emote won't show up. I have riven mastery level 3 do i need riven level 4+ to activate the dawnbringer emote ?

replies.body:
Mine is still not working either; I bought it yesterday,
I have mastery level 5 and the original mastery emote shows up.. rito pls fix.
me too i bought it today i pick riven and do the crtl 6 and it not work you dont need lvl 4 cuz i am lvl 6 riven and its not working with  me{{champion:92}}

Both of mine stopped working, before it was just the {{champion:92}} icon that did not work
Perhaps when more people buy the icon the problem will be more evident, I think the majority of people are still grinding.
Not working for me either :/ is it still ctrl+6?
There was an issue for a short period causing it to not work.  Everything should be okay now, so you can use the emote.  :D
It's not working for me either. I miss spamming it :<
Its still not working for me I just bought it yesterday and has not worked what do I do. Do I need to have the mastery for that champion?
